content.question: Colonial cities functioned primarily as

choices.label: mercantile centers for collecting agricultural goods and distributing imported manufactured goods
places were most poor immigrants settled and worked as independent artisans
centers where large scale financial and banking operations were conducted
places to which wage earners commuted from numerous surrounding communities

content.answer: mercantile centers for collecting agricultural goods and distributing imported manufactured goods

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
